PO_answers._comment: # Insert the same fields as the `PO_questions` Use Likert score from 1 to 5. DO NOT include this field in the result.

CF_answers._comment: # Insert the same fields as the `CF_questions`. Use Likert score from 1 to 5. DO NOT include this field in the result.

reasoning._comment: # Very short reasoning in phrases, ONLY for questions 1 to 10 from `PO_answers` and `CF_answers`. DO NOT include this field in the result.
